struct  OMAP2530_HalObj_tag

OMAP2530_HalObj

Hardware Abstraction object.

============================================================================

Parameters:
interface Pointer to HAL interface table.
isrObject MMU fault isr object.
generalCtrlBase base address of the control module.
mailboxBase base address of the mailbox module.
mmuBase base address of the MMU module.
prcmBase base address of the PRCM module.
tlbIndex TLB entry of the MMU module.
procId Processor ID.
type Flag to verify the static or dynamic entry. ============================================================================
